Hello there,

Below you can find our latest vServer KVM offer in our Romanian datacenter.

**ECHO1** - 6 €/month
 
 - 1 vCPU 
 - 512 MB RAM  
 - 25 GB Storage

More details and order page: https://www.hetnix.com/vps-vds.xml 
 
As payment methods we accept PayPal, Bitcoin, Debit Card, Bank Transfer (EU)

Should you have any questions, feel free to contact us via Livechat or Ticket.

Thank you.
